content: What's the current status of GrapgQL support in FHIR server? HAPI does not seem to support it yet.
I believe it does in the most recent version - maybe you should ask on the #hapi stream

Hi, does anyone have experience on using GraphQL with HAPI FHIR since I seem to be unable to figure out on how to use the POST (GraphQL) messages with it. GET seems to work fine... Just seem to be getting error: "Unable to parse GraphQL Expression: java.lang.NullPointerException"
